home_what_i_do: I make awesome websites and web app
about_desc: Hello there, my name is Khant Maw Hein and i love doing stuff for internet espaciallyopen-source projects. My love for the development started when i was 18: i was playing a french videogame called Dofus and i wanted to automate repetitive things so i built a bot for the game (it's not fair i know üôÅ). Now, i mainly develop MERN stack apps, i'm open to new opportunities. I was granduated from Yadanarbon University(Mandalay) in 2021
experience_0_overview: Real Code Solutions is a Software House.It's developed many business softwares such EPOS, POS and custom products and projects. some are freelancers, some started their startups, others work as remote developers. it's a place where we discuss about new technologies, about IT solutions, about anything in relation to Code.
